II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'06'29 505
wxl 1"765 - 2012 cqks 29 jeks isl=rdod - 2012'06'29
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 506
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2012 cQ,s ui 06 jeks Èk
m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2012 cqks ui 22 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg
NdrÈh hq;= h'
î" fla' tia' rúkaø'
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s' ^je'wd'&
2012 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
505- B 80623—2,200 (2012/06)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... 529
úúO ±kaùï ... ... ... ... 539
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
ie' hq'-  2012'06'22 osk m< jQ wxl 1"764 ork .eiÜ m;%fha I- III fldgi m< fkdùh'
ie' hq'- chr;ak moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2012 wfmA%,a ui 27 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ
m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'
úlag¾ wekagks wOHdmk iudc" wd¾Ól i;aldrl yd mqKHdOdr moku ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2012 cqks ui 01 jeks Èk Y%S
,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2012'06'29506
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - l¿;r
fkdjákd ,smsf,aLk úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I 5lg jvd merKs my; wxl i|yka kvqjd¾;d 2012'10'05 jeks Èfkka miqj wêlrK
N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQodkï lr we;' fuu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvq jd¾;djkays iy;sl
msgm;la fyda tys hï fldgila ,nd.ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd jk b,a,Sï 2012'10'05 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhd fj;
bÈßm;a l<hq;= neõ fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
ufyia;%d;a - l¿;r'
2012 uehs ui 31 jeks Èk"
l¿;r ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'
